Package de.aicard.domains.learnset

Class LearnSet

java.lang.Object
de.aicard.domains.BaseEntity
de.aicard.domains.learnset.LearnSet
@Entity
public class LearnSet
extends BaseEntity
Provides CardList with additional information: Title, Description, Faculty(to which Accounts from which Faculties it will be shown) CommentList, Evaluations(only 1 per Account to LearnSetAbo is possible) Owner(Account who created the LearnSet), Admins(Accounts who can edit the LearnSet) Visibility(to show the LearnSet to all Account, to Faculty and Friends or only to Owner)
Author:
Martin Kuehlborn
